pr_title: fix: update listPartitions() to support tables from other projects

timeline.message: fix: update listPartitions() to support tables from other projects

timeline.body:
```suggestion
    TableId metaTableId =
        tableId.getProject() == null
            ? TableId.of(tableId.getDataset(), partitionsTable)
            : TableId.of(tableId.getProject(), tableId.getDataset(), partitionsTable);
```
